dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A giant bowl of lagman stretching across a city square—now that's a way to celebrate unity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A giant bowl of lagman stretching across a city square-now that's a way to celebrate unity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And it's happening in Almaty's Zhetysu district on May 1st, for the People Solidarity Holiday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And it's happening in Almaty's Zhetysu district on May first, for the People Solidarity Holiday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Thursday, May 1, Almaty's Zhetysu district will host an event to prepare the longest lagman in Kazakhstan, according to Almaty.tv. The initiative is being held to mark Kazakhstan's People Solidarity Holiday and aims to promote national values and strengthen friendship in the country's multiethnic society.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the, uh, ethnocultural centers there are organizing it. They're aiming to set a national record.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the, uh, ethnocultural centers there are organizing it. They're aiming to set a national record.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event is organized by the ethnocultural centers of the Zhetysu district, and the record will be officially registered with the participation of representatives from the Kazakhstan Book of Records.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I love that they're doing it to promote friendship in Kazakhstan's multiethnic society. Lagman really is such a shared dish across cultures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I love that they're doing it to promote friendship in Kazakhstan's multiethnic society. Lagman really is such a shared dish across cultures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The initiative is being held to mark Kazakhstan's People Solidarity Holiday and aims to promote national values and strengthen friendship in the country's multiethnic society. Lagman is a beloved dish across many cultures, and this record-breaking version is intended to symbolize shared cultural heritage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's like, you know, food brings everyone together, no matter the background.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's like, you know, food brings everyone together, no matter the background.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're getting the Kazakhstan Book of Records involved to make it official. That's pretty cool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're getting the Kazakhstan Book of Records involved to make it official. That's pretty cool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event is organized by the ethnocultural centers of the Zhetysu district, and the record will be officially registered with the participation of representatives from the Kazakhstan Book of Records.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The event's at the Ainabulak sports complex, starting at noon. I wonder how many people it'll take to cook and serve that much lagman.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The event's at the Ainabulak sports complex, starting at noon. I wonder how many people it'll take to cook and serve that much lagman.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The event will take place at the sports and recreation complex No. 179 (˜Ainabulak') in the Ainabulak microdistrict, Zhetysu district, Almaty. It will begin on May 1, 2025, at 12:00 p.m.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure—it's gotta be a team effort. I bet it'll be a fun, like, community vibe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure-it's gotta be a team effort. I bet it'll be a fun, like, community vibe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think they'll have other activities too, or is it mostly just about the record attempt?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think they'll have other activities too, or is it mostly just about the record attempt?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Probably some cultural performances or, um, maybe even tastings? It says residents and guests are all invited.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably some cultural performances or, um, maybe even tastings? It says residents and guests are all invited.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents and guests of the city are invited to join and witness this unique occasion, the announcement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it sounds like a great way to, you know, spend the holiday—eating and celebrating together.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it sounds like a great way to, you know, spend the holiday-eating and celebrating together.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes me wish I was in Almaty next May!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes me wish I was in Almaty next May!
